ðŸ“– Summary: The pix2tex repository provides a system that converts images of mathematical formulas into LaTeX code using a Vision Transformer (ViT) model. It offers multiple interfaces for prediction, including a command-line tool, a graphical user interface (GUI), an API, and direct usage from within Python.
